sentences.en: Experimentally, one form of such uncommon matter has been observed.
sentences.cn: 人们已经在实验中观察到了这类不寻常物质的一种形式.

sentences.en: Fluctuations in the output of laser diodes have been studied experimentally and theoretically.
sentences.cn: 已经从理论和实验上研究了激光二极管输出的起伏起象.

sentences.en: If indications of instability are obtained, the results are checked experimentally.
sentences.cn: 如果得到了不稳定的征侯, 就用试验来校验结果.

sentences.en: In my opinion, the curvature was determined experimentally.
sentences.cn: 依我看, 这种曲度是根据实验确定的.

sentences.en: Lasers have been used experimentally in delicate vocal cord operations.
sentences.cn: 激光已经在难度大的声带手术中试用.

sentences.en: The amount of alcohol supplied each time is established experimentally for a given centrifuge.
sentences.cn: 对于给定的离心机,每次用醇量由经验确定.

sentences.en: The binding energy of the deuteron can be found experimentally.
sentences.cn: 可以实验测定氘的结合能.

sentences.en: This machine was introduced experimentally in 1960.
sentences.cn: 这台机器是在1960年被试验性地引进的.

sentences.en: This relation between the frequency and the field spectra was noted experimentally.
sentences.cn: 实验上已经发现频率和场频谱之间的这种关系.

sentences.en: This system is being tried out experimentally at many universities.
sentences.cn: 该系统正在很多大学试用。

sentences.en: This tendency is indeed observed experimentally.
sentences.cn: 这种趋向在实验中也确实观测到了.

sentences.en: Unfortunately , it is not possible to disentangle these two amplitudes experimentally.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是,实验上不可能分开这两个振幅.

sentences.en: Voidage is a relatively simple matter to determine experimentally.
sentences.cn: 空隙度是比较容易地用实验方法来确定的.

sentences.en: We are using the substance experimentally at first.
sentences.cn: 我们现在先试验性地使用这种物质.

sentences.en: Whether absolute zero may be achieved experimentally is a question of some interest and importance.
sentences.cn: 是否可用实验的方法达到绝对零度,乃是有趣而重要的问题.

words.tran_cn: 实验的；根据实验的；试验性的
实验；试验；实验法；实验过程

trans.tran_cn: 实验（性）地，实际上，实际证明，通过实验，用实验方法
